You don't want to get stuck at the top of this Ferris wheel.
Ain Dubai, Arabic for Dubai Eye...
...is officially the world's largest and highest Ferris wheel,...
Ferris wheels around the world let tourists see the sights from up above...
...like Florida's Orlando Eye, the Tianjin Eye in China, or the UK's London Eye.
The Dubai Eye is almost double the size of the London Eye...
...and can welcome 1,750 visitors at a time.
